column1: 6;6664572097;"Wafao";"https://itunes.apple.com/us/reviews/id163621837";"10.17.0";1;"Speaker still on after answering";"My doorbell notification chimed and I answered. It was a delivery and when the call was done I hit the X
column2: went back to the home screen on my phone
column3: locked it
column4: and place it on the coffee table. I went out front to pick up my package and I can hear my 6 year old singing along to his cartoons. I thought I was hearing things but it was clearly my child and the tv and it was coming from the doorbell cam. After securing my package
column5: I ran and grabbed my phone. I went to the doorbell cam and started speaking with the still locked phone in my hand and I can hear myself.

column1: This is a privacy concern and I wanted others to know that your microphone is still on even after going back to the home screen and locking your phone. Force quitting the app seems to be the solution so far. I hope August implements a fix for this because I‚Äôm not okay with people being able to listen in on my family and I.

I‚Äôve had the original doorbell cam when it first came out which has been replaced with the doorbell cam pro when that came out and the original smart lock which has been replaced by the 2nd gen smart lock for years now. 21;6528844826;"Nglan";"https://itunes.apple.com/us/reviews/id43189163";"10.14.1";1;"Flaky Poorly Maintained Software - AVOID";"Ive had the lock for a few weeks now. Before the release of iOS 14 the software side of the device worked fairly well. Since iOS 14 the app (and Apple Watch app) are either broken
column2: working poorly or just generally unreliable and buggy. For example pre iOS 14 if i pressed the unlock button on my Apple Watch the lock unlocked immediately. Now post iOS 14 Im lucky if the lock will unlock or lock at all on my watch
column3: it usually takes at least 3 - 4 attempts - NOT GOOD ENOUGH.

column1: Companies that make smart locks need to understand that they are making a commitment to maintain their software and that a smart lock without working software is USELSS not to mention bad for the planet.

As a developer who has also worked in the mobile realm I know that the reason for these problems is purely laziness and complacency on August Locks part. Developers are given versions of new OS months in advance to make sure the developers have time to ensure their apps work on OS launch day. NOT GOOD ENOUGH.";"2020-10-12T15:44:54-07:00";"https://itunes.apple.com/us/review?id=648730592&type=Purple%20Software";"648730592";186;"en";"POSITIVE"

column1: 2) Siri doesn‚Äôt work remotely even with a August Connect device. There‚Äôs no reason for this whatsoever. Supposedly an Apple TV would solve this

column3: nor would an Apple TV be in range of this device. Which leads to #3.

column1: 3) the Bluetooth reception on the Connect is awful even 3 feet away. All my Bluetooth smart devices work from separate rooms. But this device is so special. Ugh. It took me hours to get the device to connect at all. It‚Äôs it my WiFi (I get full reception on all my devices anywhere on my property). No signal degradation whatsoever. My mesh is setup with Ethernet backhaul. This is kinda mind boggling
I have cheap Chinese branded smart devices ($10 lightbulbs
column2: $20 switches
column3: etc) that all work with Siri with customizations
column4: and they work perfectly remotely with Siri and all my devices. But not August
column5: my most expensive smart device.

column1: 70;5114745078;"Steve_S";"https://itunes.apple.com/us/reviews/id37762058";"9.6.1";4;"Could be 5 stars";"Setup process is a little buggy. Would not recognise Bluetooth even though my phone and hub plugged into an extension cord were literally inches from the lock. Finally skipped that part of the setup and it eventually showed Bluetooth signal was good.

My biggest complaint is there is either guest or full admin access. There really should be level in between. Where you can have those users take advantage of the location aware features like auto unlock but not have full admin control to add and remove any user.

For instance. I have a few relatives living with me. While I do trust them I would rather not give them the keys to the castle so to speak. They could actually downgrade my account to guest. And i am the home owner. Seems silly to me.
So August developers and product owners if you are listening
column2: please add a ‚Äúgeneral user‚Äù to the account levels. There should only be one super admin.
